description: go-playground: add pre/post-compile hooks to playground.js

messages.text:
Hello bradfitz (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-playground

LGTM

but..
.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5658045/diff/1/static/playground.js
File static/playground.js (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5658045/diff/1/static/playground.js#newcode56
static/playground.js:56: if (opts['preCompile'])
add braces.  you have them elsewhere for single line bodies.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5658045/diff/1/static/playground.js#newcode70
static/playground.js:70: return;
braces

*** Submitted as 6006b8ca5ddc ***
